description: This file defines a Flutter widget called VocabCard, which is a UI component for displaying a vocabulary item with favorite and learned toggles. It includes visual styling and interaction logic specific to vocabulary cards in a language learning app.

classes.name: VocabCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a vocabulary item card with favorite and learned status toggles. It displays vocabulary details such as French and English words, an example sentence, category, and status indicators.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the vocabulary card, including layout, styling, and interaction handlers.
